instruction: Describe the character of Arthur in this story.
input: Arthur and Louis were two rival criminals who always competed against each other in their criminal undertakings. One day, they got into a row when Louis stole a safe from a bank and tried to escape.
output: Arthur is an ambitious criminal who is always looking for an opportunity to out-perform his rival Louis. He is competitive, daring, and will not hesitate to take risks in order to get the upper hand. However, when caught off-guard by Louis' illegal activities, he can become angry and frustrated. He is also highly committed to his criminal activities, which drives him to find creative solutions and tactics to achieve his goals.
